title: Taya Onze EVO-Light rollerless chain drops rollers to be faster, lighter, quieter, last longer
content:
Taya’s uniquely simplified Onze EVO-Light rollerless chain promises to reshape how performance chains are made. By removing one of just four elements that make up a bicycle chain, Taya says their new lightweight no-roller chain reduces drivetrain friction, retains lubrication without contamination better, and simply lasts longer.
